extendedInfo.description: Stumbler is an easy way to browse photos from Tumblr blogs on your phone. You can bookmark your favorite blog discoveries and download or share individual photos.Featuresâ Search for blogsâ Save imagesâ Share imagesâ Reblog images (see notes)â Like imagesâ View Tumblr dashboardâ View Tumblr followersâ View Tumblr followingâ Follow/Unfollow blogsâ Backup/Sync browsing historyâ GIF Supportâ Post image to Tumblrâ Live Wallpaper (Beta, not recommended for tablets)Manage your Stumblr Cloud account at http://stumblr.hostj2me.comIn the free version, "Reblogged via Stumblr" is appended to reblog comments.Like Us on Facebookhttps://www.facebook.com/stumblr*Stumbler is powered by the Tumblr API.

reviews.title: Just a viewer, limited
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t tell you the details on what blog u are using. No instructions provided. Will do some more testing to see if it is more stable than Tumblr app.
reviews.author: Mark Braums

reviews.title: TERRIBLE data usage
reviews.comment: I barely even used this app, but somehow it munched over 3GB of data. Uninstalling immediately
reviews.author: JOHN TAYLOR

reviews.title: Images
reviews.comment: Great for finding the most fresh photos <3
reviews.author: zoe hodgdon

reviews.title: ugh
reviews.comment: stopped working cant search i get nothing but errors
reviews.author: Laura Sikes

reviews.title: Great on phone. Horrendous on tablet.
reviews.comment: Love it on my phone (XPERIA TL) running 4.1.2. However, it runs laggy on my Nexus 7 running 4.3. Actual UI is fine, but when actual images appear, navigating is like molasses. Please update.
reviews.author: Curtis Greenwalt

reviews.title: Simply great!
reviews.comment: Each update is better than the previous. So far it has only two flaws: do not support multiple tumblr account (you have to logout and login again with a different account in order to switch between profiles); if you put a blog in bookmarks, and the author delete it, you can not remove it and stay there forever. But if you have a good phone is the better tumblr client I tried so far; with lots of plus like \"remix\" images, in order to edit photo form a blog and reblog it in your own.
reviews.author: Eros Dalla Lana

reviews.title: Galaxy Note
reviews.comment: Pros: Free... Official Tumblr is not free, nor does it have a free version. You can save, upload, reblog and browse. Super simple, runs great.  Cons: Operation of controls are different than other apps, it takes time to get used to. Not really much of a con, really.  People are rating low because it doesn\'t run on their phone. You\'re an idiot... Get a better phone.
reviews.author: Rocky Mills

reviews.title: No clear instructions
reviews.comment: Appears to be a decent app held back by no clear documentation. Unable to locate a way to follow blogs, only bookmark so far, or how to un-like a post.
reviews.author: Brian ginoza

reviews.title: Stumblr tumblr image viewer app sucks!
reviews.comment: Sucks, and it is impossible to find and install on google playstore app the newer free version:  Briiliance: S HTC Jetstream app!
reviews.author: alvin chipmunk

reviews.title: IDIOTS
reviews.comment: The latest update lost all my favourites,  thanks for wasting my time.  Uninstalled
reviews.author: Dean McMullen

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I just got this and I love it, but I\'ve found that not all pictures I save download. This is very frusterating. Will rate 5 stars when its fixed.
reviews.author: Ellis Taylor

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: It\'s good, exceptthere isn\'t a way to see the comments on the pictures. And the comments be extra funny. Fix it please (:
reviews.author: Alanna Watkins

reviews.title: Fix long click
reviews.comment: Long click doesnt seem to work for save, other than a gif file. Would be 5 stars other than that
reviews.author: Chris Marancik

reviews.title: Very good concept
reviews.comment: The concept and delivery of the software is very good. One star is missed because I feel that the features like slide picture and pick zoom are not effectively implemented. Double tap to zoom is also missing. Developers, please update to improve user experience.
reviews.author: Devdatta Hambardikar

reviews.title: Love This APP!
reviews.comment: It\'s just stumble upon for tumblr! Love it! Works perfectly.. never fails
reviews.author: Kristine Frank

reviews.title: Failed to post like.  Make sure out are logged in.
reviews.comment: Been getting this alot now. Not sure why but other than a few needed tweeks this is a great app may even purchase full ver after a few more updates
reviews.author: Rob Lochard

reviews.title: Fix
reviews.comment: Can you make it possible to upload text without having to add a picture along with it. Also on the dashboard page it stops at a certain point and will not load further.
reviews.author: Kairo Earl.Mccoy

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Don\'t.  Change
reviews.author: TOMMY ANDY

reviews.title: Using on s3, Data muncher....
reviews.comment: As an app ok performance but too high data usage Please do something for a better rating
reviews.author: Rajat Kasana

reviews.title: Just one thing
reviews.comment: Why still so heavy... Need to be more lighter
reviews.author: Rami As-Sudais
